Item.comments: generic method that traverses the structure of a defined relationship
Item.method_code:
'defined Releationship must have source and related item of the same type
' Item context is the itemType of the starting item (sourceItem) ' custom attribute "relationshipName" must be set. It defines the relationships to traverse ' (optional) custom attribute "isReleased='1'" can be set. To traverse logic will check for latest released child items only
' the methods returns a comma separated list of ids, or an empty result, if nothing found ' NOTE: the result does not include the id of the starting item !
'MethodTemplateName=VBMain; Dim res As Item Dim inn As Innovator Dim IdsList As String
Function Main() As Item 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() inn = Me.getInnovator()
'returns a comma separated list of item Ids IdsList = "##" 'reset global variable
Dim relationshipName As String = Me.getAttribute("relationshipName","") Dim isReleased As Boolean = (Me.getAttribute("isReleased","0") = "1")
If relationshipName = "" Then Return inn.newError("Method 'Get ItemIDs of Structure Down' failed!. Custom attribute 'relationshipName' not set.")
res = fn_traverseStructureDown (Me.GetType(), Me.GetID(),relationshipName, isReleased ) If res.isError() Then Return inn.newResult("") If IdsList = "##" Then Return inn.newResult("")
Return inn.newResult(IdsList.Replace("##,","")) End Function
'----------- Private Function fn_traverseStructureDown (startItemType As String, startItemId As String, relationshipName As String, isReleased As Boolean) As Item Dim amlCmd As String = "<Item type='" & relationshipName & "' action='get' serverEvents='0' select='sort_order,source_id(id,name,generation),related_id(id,name,generation)' >" amlCmd = amlCmd & "<source_id>" & startItemId & "</source_id>" amlCmd = amlCmd & "<related_id><Item type='" & startItemType & "' action='get' serverEvents='0' select='id,name,generation)'>" If isReleased Then amlCmd = amlCmd & "<is_released>1</is_released>" End If amlCmd = amlCmd & "</Item></related_id>" amlCmd = amlCmd & "</Item>"
Dim relsItems As Item = inn.newItem("","") relsItems.loadAML(amlCmd) relsItems = relsItems.apply() If relsItems.isError() Then Return relsItems
Dim i As Integer For i=0 To relsItems.getItemCount()-1 Dim itemId As String = relsItems.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("related_id","") If itemId <> "" Then IdsList = IdsList & "," & itemId
' recursive call fn_traverseStructureDown(startItemType,itemId,relationshipName,isReleased) Next i Return Me End Function
Item.name: Get ItemIDs of Structure Down
